title: Exploring Effective Instructional Design Through Comparative Analysis of Online Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in using online learning tools and teaching secondary mathematics
context.additional_context: Process for in-service math teachers to comparatively analyze online education environment differences using mobile devices in short-term settings

learning_goals: Explain three or more key differences between online and emergency remote teaching environments
Propose strategies to improve learner engagement based on survey data
Compare the effectiveness of instructional design elements (assessment, interaction, content organization)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
